name: Emotional Eating
description:
It’s 2021, the pandemic has swept the globe, and you're starved for something to fill the void. Chase away the bad thoughts, and win the game, by eating all food objects before your health runs out!

Made in two days for the 2021 Toronto Game Jam “Once More, With Feeling!” 

CONTROLS

Emotional Eating uses a grid-based layout system. Use WASD or the arrow keypad to navigate the world space.

  • W - Right Up
  • A - Left Down
  • S - Left Down
  • D - Right Down
  • Up - Right Up
  • Left - Left Down
  • Down - Left Down
  • Right - Right Down

You'll figure it out.

CREATORS

Hi. 

We’re Calin & Chad. 

And, we make games. Well, we’ve made one game.

We’re two 30-somethings from Calgary, AB.

Sign up to our newsletter to get exclusive emails, game updates, and bonus materials.
